name: Marc Andreessen
title: Co-Founder & General Partner
thesis: Backs bold founders building category-defining software companies. Believes software is eating the world and invests across enterprise, consumer, crypto, and bio with deep operational support.

name: Alfred Lin
title: Partner
thesis: Invests in companies with strong network effects and exceptional founders who can build enduring businesses. Focused on enterprise software, fintech, and consumer marketplaces.

name: Bill Gurley
title: General Partner (Emeritus)
thesis: Focuses on marketplace businesses and companies with strong unit economics. Believes in equal partnership models and concentrated portfolios with deep founder engagement.

name: Peter Fenton
title: General Partner
thesis: Invests in open source and developer-centric platforms that become critical infrastructure. Seeks founders with deep technical insight and authentic product vision.

name: Mary Meeker
title: Founder & General Partner
thesis: Backs growth-stage technology companies leveraging major internet and mobile trends. Known for deep data-driven analysis of macro technology shifts.

name: Roelof Botha
title: Managing Partner
thesis: Seeks founders solving fundamental problems with elegant products. Particular focus on fintech, security, and consumer applications with viral growth mechanics.

name: Reid Hoffman
title: Partner
thesis: Invests in network-effect businesses and platforms that connect people at scale. Strong interest in AI/ML and enterprise collaboration tools. Also active as an angel investor.

name: Vinod Khosla
title: Founder
thesis: Invests in transformative technologies including clean energy, AI, and healthcare. Willing to take big technical risks on moonshot ideas that can impact billions of people.

name: Kirsten Green
title: Founder & Managing Partner
thesis: Focuses on commerce-driven companies reimagining how consumers discover, buy, and engage with products. Deep expertise in D2C brands and consumer behavior shifts.

name: Josh Kushner
title: Founder & Managing Partner
thesis: Invests across consumer internet, software, and healthcare companies at all stages. Known for early conviction in transformative platforms and long-term holding periods.

name: Matt Turck
title: Managing Director
thesis: Invests in early-stage enterprise and data infrastructure companies in NYC and beyond. Known for the annual Data & AI Landscape report. Deep expertise in data, AI, and developer tools.

name: Sarah Guo
title: Founder & Managing Partner
thesis: AI-native venture fund focused on companies building with and for artificial intelligence. Backs founders leveraging foundation models to rebuild entire industries.

name: Elad Gil
title: Angel Investor & Author
thesis: Prolific angel and seed investor in developer tools, AI/ML, and infrastructure companies. Author of 'High Growth Handbook'. Invests early in technical founders with deep domain expertise.

name: Naval Ravikant
title: Angel Investor & Founder
thesis: Invests in platform companies and network-effect businesses. Pioneer of syndicated angel investing through AngelList. Focuses on teams with authentic product insight.

name: Jeff Clavier
title: Founder & Managing Partner
thesis: Seed-stage specialist backing technical founders building enterprise and consumer software. One of Silicon Valley's earliest super-angels turned institutional seed fund.

name: Jenny Lee
title: Managing Partner
thesis: Invests in cross-border technology companies connecting US and Asian markets. Focus on enterprise SaaS, marketplace platforms, and social commerce at global scale.

name: Lee Fixel
title: Founder
thesis: Growth-stage investor seeking exceptional companies with proven product-market fit. Former Tiger Global leader with focus on consumer internet and enterprise software globally.

name: Chris Dixon
title: General Partner, a16z crypto
thesis: Leads a16z's crypto fund, investing in blockchain infrastructure, DeFi, and Web3 applications. Believes decentralized networks are the next major computing paradigm.

name: Ann Miura-Ko
title: Co-Founding Partner
thesis: Seed-stage investor focused on finding 'thunder lizard' startups—companies that create entirely new categories. Deep expertise in marketplace dynamics and technical infrastructure.

name: Mike Maples Jr.
title: Co-Founding Partner
thesis: Pattern-breaks investor seeking radical startups that inflect the future. Coined the term 'micro VC' and focuses on backing founders with proprietary insights at the earliest stages.

name: Josh Wolfe
title: Co-Founder & Managing Partner
thesis: Invests in frontier technology companies commercializing science. Focus areas include advanced materials, synthetic biology, space, robotics, and defense tech. Seeks 'sci-fi becoming real.'

name: Brian Singerman
title: Partner
thesis: Backs transformative companies tackling hard technical problems. Focus on biotech, AI, and aerospace. Willing to bet on ambitious, contrarian founders with deep expertise.

name: Keith Rabois
title: General Partner
thesis: Operator-investor focused on marketplace companies, fintech, and real estate tech. Former PayPal Mafia member who backs founders with strong operational clarity and urgency.

name: Satya Patel
title: Co-Founder & Partner
thesis: Seed-stage focus on 'Bottom Up Economy' companies—startups empowering individuals and small teams to do more. Deep expertise in product management and go-to-market.

name: Hunter Walk
title: Co-Founder & Partner
thesis: Backs seed-stage companies building tools for the 'Bottom Up Economy.' Former YouTube head of product. Focuses on product-led growth and community-driven businesses.

name: Mamoon Hamid
title: Partner
thesis: Invests in enterprise SaaS companies with bottoms-up adoption and strong product-led growth. Previously at Social Capital. Seeks founders who deeply understand their users.

name: Ilya Fushman
title: Partner
thesis: Focuses on enterprise infrastructure, security, and developer tools. Former Dropbox VP. Invests in technical founders building core infrastructure for the modern enterprise.

name: Jason Calacanis
title: Angel Investor & Founder
thesis: Prolific angel investor focused on early-stage startups across sectors. Host of 'This Week in Startups.' Invests in scrappy founders with strong hustle and product instincts.

name: Garry Tan
title: President & CEO
thesis: Leads the world's most prolific startup accelerator backing 400+ companies per year. Focus on technical founders at the earliest stage across all sectors. Also active personal angel investor.

name: Dalton Caldwell
title: Managing Director, Head of Admissions
thesis: Evaluates and selects the most promising startups for YC. Focuses on team quality, market size, and founder-market fit. Deep expertise in social/consumer and enterprise SaaS.

name: Brad Feld
title: Co-Founder & Partner
thesis: Pioneer of thesis-driven early-stage investing focused on internet infrastructure, dev tools, and SaaS. Strong advocate for startup communities outside Silicon Valley. Author of 'Venture Deals.'

name: Fred Wilson
title: Co-Founder & Partner
thesis: Thesis-driven investor focused on large networks of engaged users, open protocols, and decentralized systems. Pioneer blogger in VC. Backs platforms that broaden access to resources.

name: Albert Wenger
title: Managing Partner
thesis: Focuses on companies enabling the 'knowledge age' through open data, decentralized systems, and broadened access. Author of 'World After Capital.' Invests in mission-driven founders.

name: Semil Shah
title: Founder & General Partner
thesis: Pre-seed and seed investor in technical founders building enterprise and fintech companies. Invests with conviction early and maintains strong founder relationships throughout the journey.

name: Charles Hudson
title: Founder & Managing Partner
thesis: Pre-seed investor focused on underrepresented founders and overlooked markets. Backs product-focused founders with unique insights at the earliest stages before most VCs engage.

name: Pejman Nozad
title: Co-Founder & Managing Partner
thesis: Pre-seed and seed specialist focused on Stanford and Bay Area technical founders. Known for discovering talent early. Invests in AI, enterprise, and deep tech at inception.

name: Aileen Lee
title: Founder & Managing Partner
thesis: Seed-stage investor who coined the term 'unicorn.' Focuses on large consumer and enterprise markets with network effects and data moats. Values diverse founding teams.

name: Cyan Banister
title: Angel Investor
thesis: Prolific angel investor with focus on frontier tech, space, and unconventional founders. Backs visionaries working on hard problems that most investors shy away from.

name: Alexis Ohanian
title: Founder & General Partner
thesis: Backs founders building at the intersection of technology, community, and culture. Focus on crypto, gaming, and consumer social. Believes in the creator economy and internet-native brands.

name: Li Jin
title: Founder & General Partner
thesis: Invests in the passion economy and creator tools. Backs platforms that enable individuals to monetize their unique skills and creativity. Pioneer of the 'creator economy' thesis.

name: Sahil Lavingia
title: Angel Investor & CEO of Gumroad
thesis: Invests in bootstrapper-friendly, creator-focused startups. Believes in sustainable business models over growth-at-all-costs. Backs founders building tools for independent creators.

name: Balaji Srinivasan
title: Angel Investor & Author
thesis: Invests in crypto, network states, and decentralized technology. Former CTO of Coinbase and a16z GP. Backs founders building sovereign technology and decentralized infrastructure.

name: Lachy Groom
title: Angel Investor
thesis: Former Stripe leader turned prolific angel. Invests in fintech infrastructure, developer tools, and AI companies. Known for large angel checks and deep fintech expertise.

name: Scott Belsky
title: Angel Investor & Adobe CPO
thesis: Invests in design-forward, product-led companies at the intersection of creativity and technology. Founder of Behance. Focus on tools empowering creative professionals.

name: David Sacks
title: Co-Founder & General Partner
thesis: Invests in SaaS and marketplace companies with strong network effects and data moats. Former PayPal COO and Yammer CEO. Focuses on capital-efficient businesses with clear paths to profitability.

name: Chamath Palihapitiya
title: Founder & CEO
thesis: Invests in healthcare, climate, and enterprise companies solving fundamental societal problems. Pioneered 'Capital as a Service' model. Also active in SPACs and public market investing.

name: Arlan Hamilton
title: Founder & Managing Partner
thesis: Exclusively invests in underrepresented founders—women, people of color, and LGBTQ+ entrepreneurs. Believes the best returns come from backing overlooked talent and underestimated markets.

name: Brian Armstrong
title: Angel Investor & CEO of Coinbase
thesis: Invests in crypto/Web3 infrastructure, DeFi protocols, and companies building the open financial system. Also backs AI and biotech founders with ambitious visions.

name: Nat Friedman
title: Angel Investor & Former GitHub CEO
thesis: Invests in AI-first companies and open source infrastructure. Former GitHub CEO with deep expertise in developer ecosystems. Backs ambitious founders building transformative AI applications.

name: Daniel Gross
title: Angel Investor & Founder
thesis: Invests in AI infrastructure and applied AI companies. Co-invested with Nat Friedman in many AI deals. Founded Pioneer to find and fund talent globally. Former head of AI at Apple.

name: Patrick Collison
title: Angel Investor & CEO of Stripe
thesis: Selectively invests in companies advancing science, progress, and technology infrastructure. Founded Stripe. Interested in longevity, AI, and tools for scientific advancement.

name: Trae Stephens
title: Partner
thesis: Invests in defense tech, government tech, and dual-use technology companies. Co-founded Anduril. Focuses on companies modernizing national security and critical infrastructure.

name: Andrew Chen
title: General Partner
thesis: Focuses on consumer and marketplace companies with viral growth loops. Expert in growth metrics, network effects, and product-led acquisition. Author of 'The Cold Start Problem.'

name: Martin Casado
title: General Partner
thesis: Invests in enterprise infrastructure, cloud, and security companies. Co-founder of Nicira (acquired by VMware for $1.26B). Deep technical expertise in networking and distributed systems.

name: Anjney Midha
title: General Partner, Games & AI
thesis: Leads AI investments at a16z, focusing on foundation model companies and AI-native applications. Believes AI will transform every industry and backs infrastructure plus application layer.

name: Tomasz Tunguz
title: Founder & Managing Partner
thesis: Data-driven investor focused on AI-first enterprise companies. Former Redpoint partner, known for deep SaaS benchmarking. Backs companies leveraging AI to create 10x better enterprise software.

name: Brad Gerstner
title: Founder & CEO
thesis: Crossover investor spanning public and private markets with focus on cloud, enterprise, and consumer internet. Known for large growth-stage bets in category-defining companies.

name: David George
title: General Partner, Growth
thesis: Leads growth-stage investments at a16z, focusing on scaling companies with proven product-market fit. Expertise in SaaS metrics, go-to-market, and building sales organizations.

name: Pat Grady
title: Partner
thesis: Invests in enterprise software companies with bottoms-up adoption models. Deep focus on AI-native enterprise tools and developer platforms. Expert in usage-based pricing and PLG.

name: Mike Volpi
title: Partner
thesis: Invests globally in enterprise and consumer technology companies. Particular expertise in open source, data infrastructure, and developer tools. Strong European network.

name: Danny Rimer
title: Partner
thesis: Backs consumer internet and marketplace companies globally. Early backer of transformative European startups. Focuses on network effects and global scalability.

name: Luciana Lixandru
title: Partner
thesis: Leads European investments for Sequoia. Focuses on enterprise software, marketplaces, and fintech companies with global ambitions. Deep knowledge of European startup ecosystem.

name: Neeraj Agrawal
title: General Partner
thesis: Enterprise SaaS specialist investing in category-leading B2B software companies. Known for deep understanding of SaaS metrics, churn, and expansion revenue models.

name: Byron Deeter
title: Partner
thesis: Pioneer of cloud computing investing. Created the Bessemer Cloud Index (BVP Nasdaq Emerging Cloud Index). Backs cloud-native enterprise companies at all stages.

name: Ethan Kurzweil
title: Partner
thesis: Invests in consumer internet and vertical SaaS companies. Focus on companies using data and AI to disrupt traditional industries like healthcare and financial services.

name: Ravi Gupta
title: Partner
thesis: Focuses on fintech and infrastructure companies. Former Instacart COO. Brings deep operating experience to investments in companies scaling rapidly in complex regulated markets.

name: Peter Thiel
title: Co-Founder & Partner
thesis: Contrarian investor seeking companies building monopolies through proprietary technology. Believes in definite optimism and backing founders with secrets about how the world works.

name: John Doerr
title: Chairman
thesis: Legendary investor focused on transformative technology companies. Author of 'Measure What Matters' on OKRs. Now focused on climate and sustainability investments.

name: Emily Weiss
title: Angel Investor & Glossier Founder
thesis: Invests in consumer brands, D2C companies, and community-driven businesses. As Glossier founder, brings deep expertise in building iconic consumer brands with strong communities.

name: Jess Lee
title: Partner
thesis: Focuses on consumer and design-forward technology companies. Former CEO of Polyvore. Deep expertise in social commerce, creator tools, and community platforms.

name: Tom Loverro
title: General Partner
thesis: Growth-stage investor backing category-leading companies scaling from $10M to $100M+ ARR. Focus on enterprise SaaS, fintech, and marketplace businesses with clear unit economics.

name: Paul Madera
title: Co-Founder & Managing Director
thesis: Late-stage investor in enterprise and consumer technology companies approaching IPO. Crossover fund investing in both private and public markets with deep quantitative analysis.

name: Samir Kaji
title: CEO & Founder
thesis: Builds infrastructure for emerging fund managers. Deep expertise in the GP/LP ecosystem. Previously invested in and tracked hundreds of emerging managers and their performance.

name: Nikhil Basu Trivedi
title: Co-Founder & Partner
thesis: Invests in consumer companies at seed and Series A. Previously at Shasta Ventures. Focus on marketplace, subscription, and community-driven consumer businesses.

name: Eric Bahn
title: Co-Founder & General Partner
thesis: Pre-seed investor backing hustling founders worldwide. Believes speed of execution is the best predictor of startup success. High-volume, low-check-size model investing in 50+ companies per year.

name: Elizabeth Yin
title: Co-Founder & General Partner
thesis: Pre-seed generalist investor focused on speed, hustle, and founder resourcefulness. Former YC partner. Backs scrappy founders who can do a lot with very little capital.

name: Jenny Fielding
title: Co-Founder & Managing Partner
thesis: Invests in pre-seed companies globally with a community-driven model. Former Techstars MD. Uses a network of 500+ scouts to source deals worldwide.

name: Sunil Dhaliwal
title: Founder & General Partner
thesis: Seed and Series A investor focused on enterprise infrastructure and developer tools. Deep technical background. Invests in founders building fundamental layers of the technology stack.

name: Logan Bartlett
title: Managing Director
thesis: Invests in enterprise software and infrastructure companies. Host of the Cartoon Avatars podcast. Focus on AI-enabled enterprise tools and developer platforms.

name: Masha Bucher
title: Founder & General Partner
thesis: Early-stage investor combining venture capital with media strategy. Helps portfolio companies get press coverage and build narratives. Focuses on consumer, SaaS, and health.

name: Kevin Hart
title: Founder
thesis: Invests in consumer brands, entertainment technology, and companies reaching diverse audiences. Leverages celebrity network and media platform for portfolio support.

name: Nasir Jones (Nas)
title: Founder & Managing Partner
thesis: Invests in technology and consumer companies as an early-stage angel turned institutional investor. Focus on fintech, healthcare, and companies serving underrepresented communities.

name: Ashton Kutcher
title: Co-Founder
thesis: Invests in consumer technology, marketplaces, and companies at the intersection of entertainment and technology. One of the most successful celebrity investors in Silicon Valley.

name: Jared Leto
title: Angel Investor
thesis: Active angel investor in consumer technology and social platforms. Early backer of several unicorns. Focuses on companies transforming how people communicate and create.

name: Marc Benioff
title: Investor & Salesforce CEO
thesis: Invests in enterprise cloud, AI, and purpose-driven companies through personal fund. As Salesforce founder, brings deep enterprise expertise and network to portfolio companies.

name: Jeff Bezos
title: Founder
thesis: Personal investment vehicle for the Amazon founder. Invests in transformative technology, space, media, and healthcare companies. Known for patient, long-term capital deployment.

name: Esther Dyson
title: Angel Investor & Author
thesis: Pioneer technology investor focused on health, space, and digital governance. One of the earliest angels in the internet era. Now focused on health equity and community well-being.

name: Jim Sorenson
title: Chairman
thesis: Family office investing in impact-driven companies across healthcare, education, and social enterprise. Focuses on measurable social outcomes alongside financial returns.

name: Matt Turck
title: Managing Partner
thesis: Invests in enterprise software startups that complement Microsoft's cloud ecosystem. Focus on AI, security, and developer tools.

name: Tyson Clark
title: General Partner
thesis: Backs founders using data and technology to transform enterprise infrastructure, cybersecurity, and cloud-native platforms.

name: John Somorjai
title: EVP Corporate Development & Salesforce Ventures
thesis: Strategic investments in enterprise cloud companies that extend Salesforce's ecosystem. Focus on AI agents, data, and CRM-adjacent innovation.

name: Mark Rostick
title: Vice President
thesis: Invests in disruptive technologies across AI, cloud, semiconductors, and autonomous systems that drive demand for compute.

name: Mohamed Siddeek
title: Head of Venture Investments
thesis: Strategic investments in AI infrastructure, autonomous machines, and GPU-accelerated computing startups at the frontier of deep learning.

name: SJ Park
title: Managing Director
thesis: Invests in early-stage startups building next-generation software infrastructure, AI/ML platforms, and frontier technologies.

name: Quinn Li
title: Senior Vice President & Global Head
thesis: Strategic investments in 5G, AI, automotive, IoT, and XR companies that drive mobile ecosystem innovation.

name: Paul Bernard
title: Head of Alexa Fund
thesis: Invests in voice technology, AI, smart home, and ambient computing startups that shape the future of natural interfaces.

name: Laurene Powell Jobs
title: Founder & President
thesis: Impact-oriented investing across education, immigration reform, climate, and media. Backs mission-driven founders creating systemic change.

name: Divesh Makan
title: Co-Founder & Managing Partner
thesis: Multi-family office managing wealth for tech billionaires. Growth equity in enterprise software, fintech, and consumer technology.

name: Jeff Bezos
title: Founder
thesis: Personal investments in bold, world-changing ventures across space, media, biotech, and frontier technology.

name: Marc Benioff
title: Founder & Investor
thesis: Personal investments in cloud, AI, and social impact companies. Backs founders with purpose-driven visions.

name: Li Ka-shing
title: Founder
thesis: Backs disruptive technology companies at early and growth stages with focus on AI, deeptech, biotech, and sustainability across global markets.

name: Alexandre Arnault
title: Managing Director
thesis: LVMH family office investing in consumer tech, luxury innovation, and marketplace businesses globally.

name: Kasim Kutay
title: CEO
thesis: Novo Nordisk Foundation's investment arm. Focus on life sciences, biotech, and healthcare innovation across seed to growth.

name: Elad Gil
title: Angel Investor & Author
thesis: Prolific angel backing technical founders at pre-seed/seed. Wrote 'High Growth Handbook'. Focus on AI, infra, and developer tools.

name: Scott Belsky
title: CPO at Adobe & Angel Investor
thesis: Invests in creative tools, design-led products, and the intersection of AI and creativity. Founder of Behance.

name: Lachy Groom
title: Solo GP & Angel Investor
thesis: Former Stripe exec. Backs technical founders building fintech infrastructure, AI, and developer platforms at the earliest stages.

name: Alexis Ohanian
title: Founder & Managing Partner
thesis: Reddit co-founder turned investor. Backs founders building in crypto, consumer, creator economy, and gaming with community-driven models.

name: Tina Sharkey
title: Angel Investor & Operator
thesis: Community-first brand builder. Backs consumer brands, marketplaces, and purpose-driven DTC companies led by diverse founders.

name: Cyan Banister
title: Founder & Angel Investor
thesis: Early-stage investor focused on space, crypto, AI, and unconventional founders. Known for contrarian bets and founder empathy.

name: Garry Tan
title: President & CEO, Y Combinator
thesis: Technical founder turned investor. Backs bold seed-stage founders in developer tools, AI, and frontier technology.

name: Cindy Bi
title: Founding Partner & Angel
thesis: Cross-border investor focused on AI, SaaS, and fintech. Bridges US and Chinese tech ecosystems for early-stage founders.

name: Julia Lipton
title: Founder & GP
thesis: Community-driven angel investing in SaaS, future of work, and climate tech. Backs underestimated founders.

name: Sahil Lavingia
title: CEO of Gumroad & Angel Investor
thesis: Creator economy and indie hacker champion. Backs bootstrapper-friendly startups, developer tools, and creator platforms.

name: Arlan Hamilton
title: Founder & Managing Partner
thesis: Invests exclusively in underrepresented founders: women, people of color, and LGBTQ+ entrepreneurs. Focus on early-stage tech.

name: Immad Akhund
title: CEO of Mercury & Angel Investor
thesis: Fintech founder-operator angel. Backs early-stage fintech, dev tools, and AI companies with product-led growth DNA.

name: Niklas Zennström
title: Founder & CEO
thesis: Skype co-founder backing European tech companies scaling globally. Focus on deeptech, enterprise, and climate technology.

name: Martin Mignot
title: Partner
thesis: Backs European and US founders building category-defining companies in fintech, enterprise, and consumer tech.

name: Jessica Schultz
title: Partner
thesis: Backs exceptional European founders from seed to growth. Focus on fintech, enterprise SaaS, and marketplaces.

name: Marcelo Claure
title: Former COO SoftBank & Founder Claure Group
thesis: Large-scale growth equity in transformative technology companies across LatAm, US, and global markets.

name: Shailendra J. Singh
title: Managing Director
thesis: India & Southeast Asia focused. Backs ambitious founders in consumer internet, fintech, enterprise, and healthtech across the region.

name: Jens Lapinski
title: Managing Partner
thesis: Rocket Internet's venture arm. Backs internet and technology companies globally with operational playbooks for scaling.

name: Luciana Lixandru
title: Partner
thesis: European tech investor backing category-defining companies in SaaS, security, and fintech from London. Deep expertise in enterprise software.

name: Suranga Chandratillake
title: General Partner
thesis: Europe's leading early-stage VC. Invests in AI, enterprise, and consumer companies built by European founders.

name: Yuri Milner
title: Founder
thesis: Late-stage growth investor in world-changing internet and technology companies. Massive bets on proven winners.

name: Hernán Kazah
title: Co-Founder & Managing Partner
thesis: Latin America's leading VC. MercadoLibre co-founder backing the next generation of LatAm tech from seed to growth.

name: Amit Anand
title: Founding Partner
thesis: Southeast Asia focused VC backing B2B and consumer tech founders building for the next billion users in the region.

name: Simon Schmincke
title: General Partner
thesis: Nordic and European early-stage VC. Backed Spotify early. Focus on consumer, SaaS, and fintech founders.

name: Denis Barrier
title: Co-Founder & Managing Partner
thesis: Cross-border VC connecting Europe, US, and Asia. Backs startups in mobility, fintech, and enterprise with global corporate partners.

name: Fabricio Bloisi
title: CEO
thesis: Naspers/Prosus tech investment arm. Growth-stage investing in food delivery, payments, edtech, and classifieds globally.

name: Christian Meermann
title: Founding Partner
thesis: Berlin-based seed-stage VC. Backs European founders in fintech, commerce, and SaaS with hands-on operational support.

name: Raj Ganguly
title: Co-Founder & Partner
thesis: Eduardo Saverin-backed fund bridging Silicon Valley and Asia. Enterprise-focused investments in AI, fintech, and healthcare.

name: Romain Lavault
title: General Partner
thesis: Pan-European and Africa-focused VC investing in enterprise software, deeptech, and digital health from seed to growth.

name: Harsha Kumar
title: Partner
thesis: India and Southeast Asia consumer internet and fintech investor. Focus on mobile-first companies serving emerging market consumers.

name: Aileen Lee
title: Founder & Managing Partner
thesis: Coined the term 'unicorn'. Seed and Series A investor in consumer and enterprise tech. Backs mission-driven founders building enduring companies.

name: Anu Duggal
title: Founding Partner
thesis: Invests exclusively in women-led companies at pre-seed and seed. Focus on e-commerce, health, fintech, and future of work.

name: Theresia Gouw
title: Founding Managing Partner
thesis: Cybersecurity and enterprise SaaS specialist. Backs founders building category-defining security and infrastructure companies.

name: Jenny Lefcourt
title: Partner
thesis: Seed investor and co-founder of All Raise, championing women in tech. Backs consumer, marketplace, and enterprise startups.

name: Jennifer Carolan
title: Co-Founder & General Partner
thesis: Leading edtech VC. Invests in education and workforce development companies from pre-seed through Series B.

name: Eva Ho
title: Co-Founding Partner
thesis: LA-based seed investor. Focus on applied AI, data infrastructure, and fintech. Technical founder who understands deep tech.

name: Sarah Smith
title: Partner
thesis: Growth and late-stage enterprise SaaS. Former Qualtrics. Backs founders building large-scale B2B platforms.

name: Charles Hudson
title: Managing Partner & Founder
thesis: Pre-seed specialist backing underrepresented founders in B2B SaaS, marketplaces, and fintech. First check focus.

name: Henri Pierre-Jacques
title: Co-Founder & Managing Partner
thesis: Diverse-led venture fund investing in minority and women founders. Focus on consumer, fintech, and healthcare at seed/Series A.

name: Marlon Nichols
title: Co-Founder & Managing Partner
thesis: Cultural investing at the intersection of diverse founders, technology, and shifting cultural trends. Seed and Series A.

name: Freada Kapor Klein
title: Co-Chair & Partner
thesis: Gap-closing, impact-driven seed investments in tech companies that close gaps of access for underserved communities.

name: Jenny Lee
title: Managing Partner
thesis: Cross-border US-Asia investor. One of Asia's most successful female VCs. Backs enterprise and consumer tech with global ambitions.

name: Lo Toney
title: Founder & Managing Partner
thesis: Former GV partner. Invests in diverse fund managers and directly in seed-stage startups. Focus on underrepresented ecosystems.

name: Leo Polovets
title: Co-Founder & General Partner
thesis: Data-driven seed investing. Ex-LinkedIn #2 engineer. Backs technical founders in AI/ML, fintech, and enterprise infrastructure.

name: Christine Tsai
title: CEO & Founding Partner
thesis: Global accelerator and VC. Backs early-stage founders across 80+ countries with focus on emerging markets, fintech, and marketplace businesses.

name: Philippe Laffont
title: Founder & Portfolio Manager
thesis: Tiger Global-style crossover fund. Public and private tech investing with data-driven approach to growth equity.

name: Jeff Horing
title: Co-Founder & Managing Director
thesis: ScaleUp investing in growth-stage software companies. Operational playbook for scaling B2B software from $10M to $100M+ ARR.

name: Matt Murphy
title: Partner
thesis: Multi-stage VC with deep AI conviction. Led early investments in AI infrastructure. Focus on enterprise AI, cybersecurity, and cloud.

name: Josh Wolfe
title: Co-Founder & Managing Partner
thesis: Deeptech and frontier technology specialist. Invests in the physical world: robotics, biotech, space, advanced materials, and defense tech.

name: Aydin Senkut
title: Founder & Managing Partner
thesis: Ex-Google. Seed and early-stage investor in iconic companies. Backs ambitious founders in consumer, enterprise, and fintech.

name: Citrine Angels
title: Women Angel Investing Group
thesis: Provides early-stage investment opportunities and education to female investors interested in supporting female-founded startups. Focused on increasing access to capital for women entrepreneurs.

name: District Angels
title: Angel Syndicate & Investing Collective
thesis: Angel syndicate and investing collective activating capital, community, and conviction across DC, Maryland, and Virginia. Shaping the future of innovation in the DMV.

name: New Dominion Angels
title: Mid-Atlantic Angel Group
thesis: Invests in startups located primarily in Virginia, Maryland and Washington, DC. Members are entrepreneurs, technologists, executives, and business leaders from a variety of fields who have built and led exceptional companies.

name: NextGen Angels
title: Young Angel Investor Network
thesis: Network of 70+ young angel investors in the DC area focused on backing early-stage startups. Founded by Dan Mindus to bring the next generation of investors into the angel ecosystem.

name: DMV Angel Group
title: Regional Angel Group
thesis: Entrepreneurs backing entrepreneurs and university spinouts for 20+ years in DC, Maryland, and Virginia. Focused on early-stage companies with strong founding teams and scalable business models.

name: CAV Angels
title: UVA Alumni Angel Network
thesis: Catalyzes UVA alumni engagement in entrepreneurial ecosystems and mobilizes investment in the most promising early-stage companies through educational programming, student engagement, and curated deal flow. Focused on technology and healthcare with strong UVA affiliation.

name: Dingman Center Angels
title: UMD Smith School Angel Network
thesis: University of Maryland Robert H. Smith School of Business angel network connecting experienced investors with promising early-stage ventures from the UMD entrepreneurial ecosystem and greater DMV region.

name: Virginia Active Angel Network (VAAN)
title: Virginia Angel Network
thesis: Active angel investing network operating since 2005, focused on early-stage companies in Virginia and the mid-Atlantic region. Entrepreneurs and investors collaborating to fund promising startups.

name: Zeal Capital Partners
title: Inclusive Early-Stage VC
thesis: Inclusive venture capital firm investing in seed and early-stage companies across fintech, health equity, and future of work. Founded in 2020, focused on backing diverse founders building transformative solutions.

name: Construct Capital
title: Foundational Industries VC
thesis: Invests in foundational industries of the economy that have been neglected for decades — manufacturing, logistics, defense, and energy. Partners with founders applying disruptive technologies to the backbone of GDP for a once-in-a-generation opportunity.

name: Revolution Ventures
title: Multi-Stage VC Platform
thesis: For more than two decades, Revolution has backed the people, places, and ideas that redefine what's possible. Invests in transformative technologies and iconic companies, with a focus on entrepreneurs outside traditional tech hubs. Founded by Steve Case.

name: Grotech Ventures
title: Mid-Atlantic Early Stage VC
thesis: Early investors in high-potential technology companies in the mid-Atlantic region. Focused on enterprise software, SaaS, and technology-enabled services with strong founding teams and scalable models.

name: Blu Venture Investors
title: Cybersecurity-Focused VC
thesis: Trusted, premier cybersecurity investor managing capital to back market-defining founders. Built by former operators who know what it takes to scale cybersecurity companies from inception to exit. Invests in companies using AI to stay ahead of evolving threats, from threat detection to identity and infrastructure defense.

name: Columbia Capital
title: Growth-Stage TMT VC
thesis: Venture capital firm partnering with top executives to build communications, media, and technology companies since 1989. Focused on digital infrastructure, enterprise IT, mobility, and broadband sectors.

name: Acceleprise
title: SaaS Accelerator & Fund
thesis: SaaS-focused accelerator and venture fund based in DC. Invests in early-stage B2B SaaS companies and provides hands-on mentorship, office space, and go-to-market support to help startups scale.

name: Doug Leone
title: Former Global Managing Partner
thesis: Legendary operator-turned-investor who built Sequoia into the world's most successful venture firm. Focuses on founders with deep domain expertise building durable, category-defining companies.

name: Carl Eschenbach
title: Partner
thesis: Former VMware COO who invests in enterprise infrastructure, cloud, and cybersecurity. Brings deep operational experience to portfolio companies scaling from $10M to $1B+ ARR.

name: Michael Moritz
title: Former Chairman
thesis: Legendary early-stage investor known for spotting transformational consumer and enterprise companies. Backed Google, Yahoo, PayPal, and many other iconic Silicon Valley companies.

name: Bucky Moore
title: Partner
thesis: Focuses on enterprise software and developer tools at the early stage. Looks for technical founders building products that developers love and that can become platform-scale businesses.

name: Mood Rowghani
title: Managing Partner
thesis: Leads growth-stage investments in consumer and enterprise technology. Former Twitter COO, brings deep operational experience in scaling technology companies.

name: Nicole Quinn
title: Partner
thesis: Invests in consumer brands, marketplaces, and social commerce. Former Wall Street equity research analyst with deep expertise in consumer behavior and brand building at scale.

name: Gaurav Gupta
title: Partner
thesis: Focuses on enterprise and SaaS at growth stage. Known for disciplined, metrics-driven investing in companies with strong unit economics and large TAMs.

name: Napoleon Ta
title: Partner
thesis: Early-stage investor in enterprise software, infrastructure, and AI. Focuses on technical founders building foundational technology that enables new categories of applications.

name: Delian Asparouhov
title: Principal
thesis: Invests in frontier tech including defense, aerospace, and hard tech. Co-founded Varda Space Industries. Looks for ambitious founders tackling problems the establishment ignores.

name: Scott Nolan
title: Partner
thesis: Deep tech investor focused on companies building transformative technologies in energy, bio, and advanced manufacturing. Former SpaceX propulsion engineer.

name: Ryan Hoover
title: Founder & GP
thesis: Product-obsessed investor backing early-stage consumer and creator economy startups. Founded Product Hunt. Invests in founders building products people love and talk about.

name: Harry Stebbings
title: Founder & GP
thesis: Media-turned-VC who backs exceptional founders at seed and Series A. Built the largest VC podcast (The Twenty Minute VC) giving unique deal flow and pattern recognition across thousands of founder conversations.

name: Jack Dorsey
title: Angel Investor
thesis: Backs founders working on decentralization, open protocols, and financial inclusion. Co-founded Twitter and Block (Square). Deeply focused on Bitcoin and open-source technology.

name: Austen Allred
title: Angel Investor
thesis: Backs edtech and future-of-work startups. Founded BloomTech (fka Lambda School). Invests in income share agreements, skills training, and workforce development technology.

name: Tim Ferriss
title: Angel Investor & Author
thesis: Prolific angel investor known for early bets on transformational companies. Author of The 4-Hour Workweek. Invests in health, wellness, psychedelics, and consumer technology.

name: Mike Vernal
title: General Partner
thesis: Invests in AI, enterprise, and consumer at early and growth stages. Former VP at Facebook where he led platform, search, and ads. Brings deep product and engineering expertise.

name: Sarah Tavel
title: General Partner
thesis: Focuses on consumer marketplaces and social platforms. Known for the 'Hierarchy of Engagement' framework. Former Pinterest PM. Looks for products that create compounding engagement loops.

name: Chetan Puttagunta
title: General Partner
thesis: Enterprise infrastructure and open-source software investor. Leads investments in developer tools, databases, and cloud infrastructure companies with bottoms-up adoption.

name: Alex Clayton
title: General Partner
thesis: Growth-stage investor specializing in SaaS and enterprise software. Known for deep quantitative analysis of SaaS metrics and public market benchmarking to identify best-in-class private companies.

name: Sameer Gandhi
title: Partner
thesis: Invests in enterprise SaaS and fintech. Seeks companies with strong network effects and platform potential. Known for helping founders navigate from product-market fit to scale.

name: Rick Zullo
title: Founder & Managing Partner
thesis: Thesis-driven seed investor focused on overlooked industries ripe for tech transformation including logistics, insurance, real estate, and government. Publishes detailed market maps before investing.

name: Tige Savage
title: Managing Partner
thesis: Growth equity investor focused on transformative technology companies outside Silicon Valley. Part of Steve Case's Revolution ecosystem. Backs companies disrupting large traditional industries.

name: Steve Case
title: Chairman & CEO
thesis: Pioneer of the 'Rise of the Rest' movement backing startups outside coastal tech hubs. AOL co-founder. Believes the next wave of innovation will come from diverse cities across America.

recentInvestments.company: Rise of the Rest Seed Fund III

name: Mark Ein
title: Founder & CEO
thesis: DC-based entrepreneur and investor focused on media, sports, and technology. Owns Kastle Systems, the Washington Kastles, and Cision. Invests in companies with strong brands and recurring revenue.

name: Donn Davis
title: Co-Founder & Managing Partner
thesis: Early-stage investor at Revolution's seed/Series A vehicle. Former AOL executive. Focuses on consumer internet, marketplaces, and technology-enabled services across the US.

name: Tien Wong
title: Founder & CEO
thesis: Prolific DMV angel investor and serial entrepreneur. Founded Lore Systems and CyberRep. Active connector in the DC tech ecosystem. Invests in enterprise software, cybersecurity, and govtech startups.

name: Jonathan Aberman
title: Managing Director
thesis: National security and intelligence-focused VC in the DC area. Invests in dual-use technologies that serve both government and commercial markets. Advisor and mentor in the DMV startup ecosystem.

name: Reggie Aggarwal
title: Angel Investor
thesis: Cvent founder (IPO, $4.6B acquisition by Blackstone). Active DC-area angel investing in enterprise SaaS, events tech, and hospitality tech. Mentors founders in the DMV ecosystem.

name: Raul Fernandez
title: Chairman & Angel Investor
thesis: One of the most prominent tech entrepreneurs in the DC area. Co-owner of Monumental Sports & Entertainment (Wizards, Capitals). Invests in enterprise tech and sports tech. Deep DC network.

name: Brian Hollins
title: Angel Investor & Advisor
thesis: DC-based angel focused on underrepresented founders building enterprise and govtech solutions. Advocates for diversity in venture capital and supports founders through mentorship and capital.

name: Navin Chaddha
title: Managing Partner
thesis: Invests in enterprise, AI, and people-first companies. Coined 'people-first' investing approach. Backs technical founders building in AI infrastructure, cybersecurity, and enterprise cloud.

name: Ethan Batraski
title: Partner
thesis: AI-native and enterprise software investor. Former Uber, YouTube PM. Focuses on applying AI to transform large enterprise categories. Deep technical evaluation of AI/ML architectures.
